snippet: Anders Nilsson, a 21-year-old Swedish goalie, kept his team in the Eastern Conference playoff race with a 1-0 win over the Devils on Sunday.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat New Jersey Devils, 1-0; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Anders Nilsson, a 21-year-old Swedish goalie, kept his team in the Eastern Conference playoff race with a 1-0 win over the Devils on Sunday.

headline.seo: Islanders Goaltender’s First Victory Is a Big One
headline.main: Islanders Goaltender’s First Victory Is a Big One
headline.print_headline: Islanders Goaltender’s First Victory Is a Big One
